titleStmt.title: A whip for the present House of Lords, or the Levellers levelled. in an epistle writ to Mr. Frost, secretary to the Committee of State, that sits at Darby House, in answer to a lying book said to be his called A declaration, &c. / By L.C. Io. Lilburne, prerogative prisoner in the Tower of London, Feb. 27, 1647.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
Frost, Walter, fl. 1619-1652.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: "Your antagonest, John Lilburne"; also signed by Lieutenant General Robert Everard, and 11 others.
Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
